thread.title: LOOK: Ginebra stars hand out roses for Valentine's
thread.title_full: LOOK: Ginebra stars hand out roses for Valentine's

author: Rappler.com
title: LOOK: Ginebra stars hand out roses for Valentine's
text:
PBA LOOK: Ginebra stars hand out roses for Valentine's Scottie Thompson, Sol Mercado, Greg Slaughter, Kevin Ferrer, and Mark Caguioa hand out flowers at halftime during Game 3 of their semis series Published 10:33 PM, February 14, 2017 Updated 10:33 PM, February 14, 2017 Barangay Ginebra center Greg Slaughter, though injured, is seen handing out flowers to fans. Photo from facebook.com/ginebra1979 
MANILA, Philippines â€“ Fans were treated to a little surprise a day before Valentine's Day on Tuesday, February 13, when Barangay Ginebra stars came out at halftime with flowers in hand to give away. 
A photo set from a Ginebra fan page shows the encounter with players including Scottie Thompson, Sol Mercado, Greg Slaughter, Paolo Taha, Kevin Ferrer, Japeth Aguilar, Mark Caguioa, and Jervy Cruz among those seen handing out red roses at halftime of Game 3 of   semifinals. 
Ginebra went on to win Game 3, 73-62, against the Star Hotshots to trail by 2-1 in the best-of-7 series.
